document_data.name: ''Samigel's Dead Slayer''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Samigel's Dead Slayer''''' was a magic bludgeon effective against the [[undead]].
document_data.Description: ''Samigel's Dead Slayer'' was a [[club]] made of wood and bound in [[silver]].
document_data.Powers: The ''Dead Slayer'' had a ''+4'' enchantment placed upon it that also significantly improved the wielder's reflexes. When used against undead creatures, this bludgeon effectively became a ''+7'' enchanted weapon. Additionally, this club allowed the user to cast the ''[[protection from evil]]'' spell on themselves.
document_data.History: In [[1369 DR]], ''Samigel's Dead Slayer'' was one of the artifacts scavenged from the [[Elven Catacombs]] by the [[drow]] of [[House Freth]]. This enchanted club was deposited in one of the chests in the makeshift prison area used by the drow and their [[Cult of the Dragon]] allies.
